data.title: Careers at Blackstone
data.meta_description: Blackstone invests in retention and development. Our objective is to recognize talent, respect hard work and reward success.
data.text:
Our employees are integral to the firm’s culture of integrity, professionalism and excellence.

At Blackstone, we look to attract and retain the brightest minds in the business, hiring professionals and students in every area of the firm. Our employees’ passion for their work and commitment to their clients have helped Blackstone become one of the most respected financial institutions and a trusted partner for some of the largest investors in the world.

Blackstone has a formal recruitment policy. Search firms interested in working with Blackstone should contact the Human Resources team to ensure Terms & Conditions are agreed upon before introducing candidates or engaging in work.

Phishing Messages Alert:

Blackstone has recently become aware of fraudulent emails, texts and social media messages purporting to offer employment at Blackstone and misusing the official Blackstone logo. These messages do not originate from Blackstone or any of our affiliates. If you have received any such messages, you should not click any links in the messages or provide any personal information (e.g., your social security number or scans of identity documents). For more information on Phishing and Fraud Awareness, click here.

Health Plan Disclosure:

Consistent with the requirements of the federal Transparency in Coverage final rule, negotiated rates for all covered items and services between Blackstone’s insurance provider Aetna and in-network providers for the plans are available here.
